title: AAC Media Day and Preview of Pac-12 Media Day
description:
Wendi Nix, Trevor Matich and Harry Lyles Jr. discuss expectations for Cincinnati after reaching the College Football Playoff last season. Plus, Adam Rittenberg joins the show to preview the biggest storylines ahead of Friday's Pac-12 Media Day. Notre Dame defensive end Isaiah Foskey joins the show to discuss what's ahead for the Fighting Irish in 2022 as Marcus Freeman enters his first season as head coach.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew breaks down the action from AAC Media Day and previews Friday's Pac-12 Media Day
